# blastshield_eventlogrules (Data Source)

Lists Blastshield eventlogrules with optional filters.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `actions` (List of String) Filter by actions.
- `apply_to_groups` (List of Number) Filter by apply_to_groups.
- `email_recipients` (List of String) Filter by email_recipients.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Filter by enabled.
- `id` (List of Number) Filter by id.
- `name` (List of String) Filter by name.
- `tags` (List of String) Filter by tags.

### Read-Only

- `eventlogrules` (Attributes List) List of eventlogrules matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--eventlogrules))

<a id="nestedatt--eventlogrules"></a>

Read-Only:

- `actions` (Set of String)
- `apply_to_groups` (Set of Number)
- `conditions` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--eventlogrules--conditions))
- `email_recipients` (Set of String)
- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `id` (Number)
- `name` (String)
- `tags` (Map of String)
